consent_exact: متوجه ریسک این سبد دارایی شدم و باهاش موافق هستم.
consent_english: I understand the risk of this portfolio and I agree with it.

questions.text: هر ماه می‌دونی چقدر پول قراره بیاد؟
questions.english: Do you know how much money is coming in each month?

options.english: Yes, my salary is fixed

options.text: تقریباً، ولی یه کم بالا پایین داره
options.english: Roughly, but it varies a bit
No, it's different every month

questions.text: اگه یه خرج بزرگ غیرمنتظره پیش بیاد، بدون دست زدن به این پول چقدر دووم میاری؟
questions.english: If a big unexpected expense came up, how long could you last without touching this money?

options.english: I can't, I'd have to use this
A month or two, no more

options.text: چند ماه راحت، جدا پس‌انداز دارم
options.english: Several months easily, I have separate savings

questions.text: این پول قراره خرج چیزی بشه؟ مثلاً قسط، اجاره، خرج خونه؟
questions.english: Is this money meant to cover something?

options.english: Yes, I have fixed expenses with it

options.text: شاید یه بخشیش رو لازم داشته باشم
options.english: I might need part of it
No, this is extra money

questions.text: کِی ممکنه این پول رو لازم داشته باشی؟
questions.english: When might you need this money?

options.english: Maybe in a few months
Probably in a year or two
Nothing soon, it's long-term

questions.text: قبلاً شده چیزی بخری و قیمتش بیفته؟ چیکار کردی؟
questions.english: Have you ever bought something and its price dropped?

options.english: Sold it to avoid more loss

options.text: نگهش داشتم ولی کلی استرس داشتم
options.english: Kept it but was very stressed

options.text: نگهش داشتم، زیاد فکرم رو درگیر نکرد
options.english: Kept it, didn't think about it much
No, this hasn't happened to me

questions.text: وقتی پولت جایی گذاشتی، هر چند وقت یه بار سر می‌زنی ببینی چی شده؟
questions.english: How often do you check on your investments?

options.text: هر روز، بعضی وقتا چند بار
options.english: Every day, sometimes multiple times
Once or twice a week
Rarely, when I remember
My money went down, I lost

options.text: هر دو بد هستن، ولی ضرر بدتره
options.english: Both are bad, but losing is worse

options.text: نخریدم و سودش رو از دست دادم
options.english: I didn't buy and missed the gains

questions.text: اگه مجبور بشی همین الان همه‌ی این پول رو نقد کنی، چقدر به‌هم می‌ریزی؟
questions.english: If you had to cash out right now?

options.english: A lot, I'm counting on it

options.text: یه کم اذیت میشم ولی نه خیلی
options.english: A bit annoying but not too much
Nothing, I just want it to grow
